New Records: The White Sox scored 7 runs in an inning for the first time this season, and Chris Flexen had a franchise-record 23 straight winless starts
Key Match Events: The White Sox had a 7-run 5th inning, and Chris Flexen pitched a gem to secure the sweep over the Angels
Pre-Game Insights: Fans were frustrated with the team, but still showed up in large numbers, and the team was looking to turn their season around
Post-Match Reflections: The team was appreciative of the fan support, and manager Grady Sizemore was moved by the players' support for him
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox drew 1,380,433 fans for the season, with an average of 17,928 per game, and Brooks Boyer expressed gratitude for the fan support
Others: The team is looking to earn back the trust of the fans, and Chris Getz is going through a thorough search for a new manager
